name: Spacetime Bug
description:
Spacetime Bug is a game about a little creature that can move through time and metamorphize! Help it escape the space station by using its skills to solve some simple puzzles! 

Tiles by Karthima and Noneegy 

Character, Instructions page and End page by Noctiluca 

UI, Music and Main menu art by Ciannyl 

Game Design and Programming by Iman 

Level Design by Iman, Noctiluca, Noneegy
